channel.title: Rafa Cruz on djvelimir.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Rafa Cruz on djvelimir.github.io

item.title: Things Will Never Be The Same (Roxette cover)
item.description: Lay it down Pull my heart to the ground Time’s getting cold Now the leaves all turn hard and blue And I know When I gaze to the sun No place to hide I got nowhere to run from you Away from you Hold me now Girl, I don’t know when When we will ever meet again That was then Baby, this is now I try to get over you
